project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where a player can explore various rooms, pick up items, manage an inventory, and face simple challenges.

task.name: Design the overall game structure and room navigation
Implement inventory management for the player
Create simple challenges for the player to encounter
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
